name: Emergency Care
des: Emergency Care is an essential part of the health system and serves as the first point of contact for many around the world.

name: Operation Theatre
des: The operation theatres are well equipped with medical gas points, medical gas alarms, optical fire detectors.

name: Outdoor Checkup
des: Outdoor Checkup. There is an outdoor treatment zone or section in Vijetha Hospital for regular health checkups of different disease.

name: Cancer Service
des: Accurate, up-to-date, comprehensive cancer information from the U.S. government's principal agency for cancer research.
